title: You can get punished for talking sense to your team, stopping two guys from inting, and winning game
body:
So, I had Vayne-Soraka bot, we were winning and enemy Cho'Gath was afk, but these two started fighting each other for something stupid like Soraka taking two lasthits by accident. Vayne started inting and went something like 0/5 while flaming Soraka, Soraka got mad and started running it down mid too while flaming Vayne back. I talked sense into both of them, they both said "Ok but just for you mate", they muted each other and only talked to me, they played the game well and we won the game in the end, I got 3 honors from my team.

I know I did some things wrong, like using caps lock and asking "are you 12 year old?", but cmon...

Here's the chatlog with very minor changes to make it more clear who's talking to who (I changed words like "you" to "soraka" and "dude" to "vayne", nothing that affects the actual conversation):

Gibo51lt: omg fail stun sry
Gibo51lt: cho afk
Gibo51lt: akali can snowball mid after lvl 6
Gibo51lt: kill hjim
Gibo51lt: akali you should gank mid
Gibo51lt: AKALI CAN YOU HELP YOUR TEAM?
Gibo51lt: vayne omg
Gibo51lt: 4v5
Gibo51lt: don't go afk
Gibo51lt: they hvae cho afk
Gibo51lt: vayne
Gibo51lt: you wanna get banned because of soraka?
Gibo51lt: well riot don't know that
Gibo51lt: all their algorithm see is you go afk
Gibo51lt: vayne so what
Gibo51lt: this is free elo
Gibo51lt: akali carry easily
Gibo51lt: you play to lose ?
Gibo51lt: or to win?
Gibo51lt: soraka stop flaming her back please
Gibo51lt: jsut mute her
Gibo51lt: and let her play
Gibo51lt: stop it omg
Gibo51lt: vayne and soraka mute each other
Gibo51lt: and play
Gibo51lt: for win
Gibo51lt: pls
Gibo51lt: vayne stop she's not worth it
Gibo51lt: soraka you're reported too if you troll
Gibo51lt: soraka you're no better than vayne if you do that
Gibo51lt: no just push
Gibo51lt: let her last hit
Gibo51lt: she will carry late
Gibo51lt: soraka chill
Gibo51lt: soraka chill he's not gonna report anyone lol
Gibo51lt: "fck you all" what did I do soraka ??
Gibo51lt: don't let vayne ruin game for the rest of us
Gibo51lt: omg
Gibo51lt: well let her say anything she want
Gibo51lt: mute her
Gibo51lt: JUST MUTE EACH OTHER NOBODY ELSE CARES ABOUT YOUR FIGHT
Gibo51lt: YOU ARE TWO RANDOM PEOPLE ON THE INTERNET, WHY DO YOU CARE OF EACH OTHER?
Gibo51lt: soraka you come league to play or to talk ?
Gibo51lt: if you come to play and have fun, then ignore vayne
Gibo51lt: I am not on anyone's side
Gibo51lt: i don't care who said what
Gibo51lt: I just want you both to be quiet and focus on game
Gibo51lt: I don't care who started
Gibo51lt: "but she started" are you 12 year old?
Gibo51lt: I come here to play after a stressful work day
Gibo51lt: and all I see is people fighting each other
Gibo51lt: when there's an enemy to fight
Gibo51lt: yeah and vayne also hopes you lose all games, so what?
Gibo51lt: you're two strangers online
Gibo51lt: I just hope we can play the game and have fun together and kick the enemy's ass...
Gibo51lt: n1 stun vayne
Gibo51lt: nicee
Gibo51lt: 1-3-1
Gibo51lt: nah not yet
Gibo51lt: we need one pick
Gibo51lt: then we can baron without risk
Gibo51lt: vayne we can probably, but get one pick so it's safer
Gibo51lt: 1-3-1 ?
Gibo51lt: 2-3-0 better
Gibo51lt: gg guys

There was also another game in my ticket where I did flame, but the thing is, that other game happened like a week prior to this game. What this means is that the first game alone wasn't enough to get me banned, Riot still allowed me to continue and show that I can improve. Which I did, and didn't flame ever again. Until, apparently, this chat log that I posted above. Which almost unarguably isn't flaming since I helped my team get their shit together and am the only reason we won the game.

{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}
{{champion:202}} "Almost Perfection"
https://i.imgflip.com/2278in.jpg

I assume that would be the game2 he is talking about, which he doesn't deny of being toxic.

However, he did clearly show in game1 that he was trying to keep the team together. So the debate I have (and don't know if it is worth debating) for him is whether game1 (assuming that is the game that got him punished) should punish him.

Granted he's probably on knife's edge of nearly getting punished anyways, but I feel that his game1 shouldn't have been the one that breaks the camel back, unless game1 wasn't one that broke the camel's back, in which I shall withdraw my opinion.

Interesting, I just read all that and I'm finding it hard to spot anything super toxic, sure he seems quite wound up and a little aggressive, but I'm surprised this got pulled up as ban/suspension worthy or what ever the punishment was.

What part stood out in particular to you may I ask?

> [{quoted}](name=Rengooo,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jnsaYuqg,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2018-01-06T10:14:53.156+0000)
>
> Interesting, I just read all that and I'm finding it hard to spot anything super toxic, sure he seems quite wound up and a little aggressive, but I'm surprised this got pulled up as ban/suspension worthy or what ever the punishment was.
> 
> What part stood out in particular to you may I ask?

If none of it was toxic, why did the OP think he needed to edit some of it out?

Mind if I ask what he got punished with.......if you're able to?

Because, I have to admit, none of this seems ban worthy. Maybe a few games chat restricted at most. But then, if that is the case, then alot of other people need to be chat restricted, because even I'm at fault for this kind of language, and I've never gotten a single chat restriction.

The first game's log was actually ok. yes he used some swear words, but none were directed at anyone, he was very metaphoric in that one with stuff like "kick the enemy's ass"

The second logs however are indicating that he supported inting and was doing the very Thing he tried to stop in his first game, which was fighting with others.

The first game wasn't punishment deserving, the second one however was, and made up for what the first one was ok for.
the master of savagery strikes again!

welp I'm confused, the OP didn't edit any toxicity out of the original log, idk why ppl sayin they lied; and if the first game, the one from a week ago, was indeed suspension worthy, then it should've been done there and then, because I don't see anything noteworthy in this 2nd game's original chat log.

and even in the first game, breaking it apart, those 3 all chat lines that look like feeding cannot be proven to be as such just from chat, you'd have to see the game, maybe they were baiting with 5 ppl in a bush :) (no suspension meant either no game check or no actual feeding). Everything else was just a whole lotta talk n spam. OP does need to shut it and play, but:

tellin someone they suck is like the most kiddish and innocent way of tellin someone off... srsly now, guys!

to the OP: less QQ more Pew Pew, it will save you a lot of trouble. The chances of changing 1 player's mind, let alone 2, are minimal at best. No point risking it every god dam game. But if you insist on doing it, try your hardest and keep it super clean, especially since you have a record, so to speak :P
Except the cut out portion telling the enemy team to come get the buff for one?

that's in the first game.... that they didn't post
huh?

Okay, so I was a bit skeptical until you mentioned that there was another game that you didn't even show. That only leads me to believe it was _really_ bad. But I think in terms of punishable things this game, calling out peoples' scores is probably bannable in itself. When I'm feeding (they weren't even doing that bad, 1/3/1 isn't terrible) and people call out my scores I get INSANELY tilted. 

Also Riot doesn't know you're the only reason you won. As far as they're concerned, you flamed in 2 games and therefore deserve to be punished for them. 

You can turn around peoples' attitudes in games without being annoying about it, which you almost did, but better luck next time I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=scribbles782,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jnsaYuqg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-05T18:35:35.918+0000)
>
> Okay, so I was a bit skeptical until you mentioned that there was another game that you didn't even show. That only leads me to believe it was _really_ bad. But I think in terms of punishable things this game, calling out peoples' scores is probably bannable in itself. When I'm feeding (they weren't even doing that bad, 1/3/1 isn't terrible) and people call out my scores I get INSANELY tilted. 
> 
> Also Riot doesn't know you're the only reason you won. As far as they're concerned, you flamed in 2 games and therefore deserve to be punished for them. 
> 
> You can turn around peoples' attitudes in games without being annoying about it, which you almost did, but better luck next time I guess.

saying " you wanna get banned.." and "soraka you're reported too if you troll" Is what got this game marked with toxic.

Try to avoid saying "yourself" "afk" "feeding" "fed" "reported" "Banned" "flaming" "inting" "intentionally" "Trolling", Those all seem to mark the game as toxic regardless of the context and it's because of this system that they're now groups of people baiting players into a ban, and also partly Riot Tantrum fault for revealing too much of the system to the players.

I personally think you did a great job regardless, you managed to pull your team together and made them cooperate as a team, this game alone should absolve you of whatever you said last game.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellmaximus1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jnsaYuqg,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-01-05T19:32:15.565+0000)
>
> saying " you wanna get banned.." and "soraka you're reported too if you troll" Is what got this game marked with toxic.
> 
> Try to avoid saying "yourself" "afk" "feeding" "fed" "reported" "Banned" "flaming" "inting" "intentionally" "Trolling", Those all seem to mark the game as toxic regardless of the context and it's because of this system that they're now groups of people baiting players into a ban, and also partly Riot Tantrum fault for revealing too much of the system to the players.
> 
> I personally think you did a great job regardless, you managed to pull your team together and made them cooperate as a team, this game alone should absolve you of whatever you said last game.

And companies in 2017 still haven't learned that you don't make a computer do a human's job.

what you mean is there are limits and the algorithm can be improved :D
machines and computers have been doing humans' jobs for decades.

> [{quoted}](name=Falkentyne,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jnsaYuqg,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-05T20:08:00.542+0000)
>
> And companies in 2017 still haven't learned that you don't make a computer do a human's job.

Did you get replaced at the factory or something?
Yea, just make a team to go through the hundreds of thousands of reports that they get on a daily basis. That'll work _fiiiiiiiiiiiiine_.
lolwut
1-3-1 and 2-3-0 were probably gameplay strats of split pushing and map-wide pressure.
20 days late but i thought 1/3/1 = "lets push 1 top 3 mid 1 bot"

> [{quoted}](name=notice me Sin pi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jnsaYuqg,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-01-26T03:40:03.931+0000)
>
> 20 days late but i thought 1/3/1 = "lets push 1 top 3 mid 1 bot"

It very well could mean that, but in the context of these logs it's pretty likely that he was flaming another player' score. If he did mean 1-3-1 pushing strat he should have specified.

honestly i would submit a ticket no matter what, to see if they will unban you. Ive been banned and the day that ive been banned was also the day i was unbanned. After an hour or so of submitting my ticket to riot saying that i shouldnt have been banned, they replied back and gave me 14-day suspension. Now of course we both have different scenarios, i only said 2 things that were a TINY bit toxic which led this to my ban. Besides that, they even said after my 14-day suspension, I have been improving in not being toxic, so it is worth a try no matter how bad it looks.

From Tantram's correction in your logs

>[6:40] [All] Gibo51lt (Poppy): come my red
[6:42] [All] Gibo51lt (Poppy): ori won't movce
[6:53] [All] Gibo51lt (Poppy): free red

That alone is worth a 14-day, minimum.

it's not a correction, it's an addition, as the OP mentions it but didn't post it (for w/e reason) and still admitted they were being toxic. and if no ban, apparently not ban-worthy toxic, just on-their-radar toxic :P

hmmmmmmmmmmm....

If this is all true and unedited, I can see your effort in trying to keep the team together. 

Submit a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com and **ask for a manual review of the punishment** (and don't ask for anything else), maybe they can do something about it. No idea how long it may take, as they'll probably have to send the ticket back to NA head quarters to review and no guarantees as well.

Even if they do over turn it, it will still mean that your account is very very close to punishment. Keep in mind that you aren't punished for those two games alone, the reform card shows you 1-5 recent games of unacceptable behavior as examples. There are probably a few more toxic games that you aren't shown.
Thanks to Tantram, proven to be edited logs

Omg, the {{summoner:11}} is real!

Why do you people do this? (blatantly lie)
{{summoner:11}}
Posters stop being an ass, and start helping !

I don't see how this is toxic at all . Obviously having two teammates arguing and some afking is going to tilt you and you're only human . This system is garbo needs a complete rework . Sorry about your ban though, they really don't put any work into it and instead they let the robot ban lmao..
riot hates it when you communicate to your fellow summoners. this is why no white people play league anymore.
